XPathVariable * _next
 The next variable in the variable set. I think, and I am not certain, that this is a circularly linked list.

Friends

class XPathVariableSet

Detailed Description

A single XPath variable.

This is intended to be used as a single member of an XPathVariableSet, and for moving data into and out of XPathQueries.
